title: One million AI satellites to orbit Earth? SpaceX's mind-blowing plan of data centers in outer space explained
summary_full: SpaceX has proposed a radical plan to deploy up to a million solar-powered satellites as orbital data centers for AI. This ambitious project aims to meet soaring AI compute demands, offering potential energy efficiency over terrestrial facilities. While promising a revolution in computing, the proposal faces significant concerns regarding space debris, regulation and technical feasibility.
